fm.views module¶

class fm.views.SendMessageView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.views.generic.edit.FormView

Screen to let users send email to a facilities manager, with the email address coming from FM_EMAIL in settings. Messages are stored in the database before sending.
